description: Searches for reasons and causes; considers factors that affect situations.
Uses the past to understand the present; values history and origin stories.
Imagines what could be; energizes self/others with a picture of the future.
Fascinated by ideas; finds connections between seemingly unrelated concepts.
Collects information, resources, and artifacts; enjoys accumulating and curating.
Enjoys thinking and mental activity; appreciates deep, reflective conversations.
Loves learning and improving; energized by the process more than the outcome.
Quickly spots patterns and paths; creates alternative routes forward.
Lives in the moment; flexible and responsive to changing demands.
Believes things happen for a reason; sees links among people and events.
Sees potential in others; invests in growth through small improvements.
Senses others’ feelings; intuitively understands perspectives and emotions.
Seeks consensus; looks for common ground and avoids unnecessary conflict.
Brings people in; notices exclusion and works to include others.
Notices what’s unique in each person; tailors collaboration to individuals.
Brings enthusiasm and optimism; elevates energy and celebrates progress.
Prefers deep, trusting relationships; enjoys working closely with known people.
Turns thoughts into action; impatient for progress and momentum.
Takes charge in ambiguity; comfortable making decisions and asserting direction.
Puts thoughts into words; explains, tells stories, and makes ideas clear.
Measures success against others; motivated to win and improve ranking.
Builds on strengths to reach excellence; turns “good” into “great.”
Trusts an inner compass; confident taking risks and managing life.
Wants to make a big impact; prioritizes work that feels important.
Enjoys meeting new people; wins others over and builds quick rapport.
Has stamina and drive; enjoys being busy and getting things done.
Organizes resources flexibly; coordinates many variables for productivity.
Driven by enduring core values; seeks meaning and purpose in work and life.
Seeks fairness and clear rules; treats people consistently and equitably.
Careful and vigilant; anticipates obstacles and weighs risks before acting.
Creates structure and routines; prefers order, precision, and predictability.
Prioritizes, takes direction, and stays on track; makes necessary course corrections.
Takes ownership of commitments; dependable follow-through and integrity.
Energized by solving problems; diagnoses what’s wrong and fixes it.
